name: Blocky Cop Racer
description:
Can you outran the cops?

Race against cops, tanks, choppers, jeeps and many more in Randomly chosen different Endless levels and night mode ,everything made with awesome blocky graphics.

How to Play
• Score by destroying cars and collect coins to unlock other cars. 
• Tap on the arrows to accelerate around.

A tip for highscore
•Take sharp turns around houses and trees to avoid cops and score more.

Features
• Leaderboards
• Randomly chosen different levels
• Different playable cars
• Daily Rewards
• Amazing blocky graphics and playful music
• Night mode
